notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All relevant data are within the paper and its Supporting Information files. All protocol files are available from the protocols.io database (DOI: dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.srjed4n; DOI: dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.q3sdyne). All NoV sequences files are available from the GenBank database (accession numbers: KU724080â€“KU724082, MG871408- MG871413, MH106750-MH106779, and MH106986-MH107008.)
